overview: This documentary film is about Martha, Winnie, Stella, and Yvonne who, as people wanting to immigrate to Canada, are struggling to deal with having been denied. State bureaucrats have deemed them to be social, legal and health risks. The film asks the viewer to consider and contemplate answers to this question: How would you feel about being discredited, singled out, disproportionately probed, and rendered ‘medically inadmissible’ based on your bodily status?
title: The Unmaking of Medical Inadmissibility
